me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.util

Class HandlerContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Salt.Util.Utility.Games.CardsAgainstDiscord.util.HandlerContainer

  • public class HandlerContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a container for a CaDGameHandler. It stores information about the game for the CaDGameManager, such as whether or not the game should be run through the invocation method.
    See Also:
    CaDGameManager.invoke()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CaDGameHandler handler
      The CaDGameManager instance this class' instance references to.
      private java.util.List<Round> rounds
      A list of Rounds within this game instance.
      private boolean shouldInvoke
      A boolean, representing if the game instance should be invoked upon.
